医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员探索牙齿脱落与假牙使用、饮食改变和认知能力下降之间的联系最近的一项 npj 衰老研究评估了受牙齿缺失影响的特定大脑区域及其相关原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Researchers-explore-link- Between-tooth-loss-and-denture-usage-diet-changes-and-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Researchers-explore-link- Between-tooth-loss-and-denture-usage-diet-changes-and-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8c87099-c8d8-4cda-bd05-f6a35a86671a Mon, 25 Mar 2024 13:58:00 -0400 Researchers explore link between tooth loss and denture usage, diet changes and cognitive decline
父母的困境：决定何时让孩子在家不上学一项新的全国民意调查显示，许多家长在决定他们的初中或高中年龄的孩子感觉不舒服时是否应该留在家里不上学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Parental-dilemmas-Deciding-when-to-keep-a-child-home-from-school.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Parental-dilemmas-Deciding-when-to-keep-a-child-home-from-school.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4092be9-0347-4b23-8129-f3226b007a45 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 13:57:50 -0400 Parental dilemmas: Deciding when to keep a child home from school
揭示表观遗传对自身免疫性皮肤病的影响中心法则提出，在基因表达过程中，遗传信息主要从 DNA 转移到 RNA，以产生功能性产物蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Unraveling-epigenic-contributions-to-autoimmune-skin-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Unraveling-epigenic-contributions-to-autoimmune-skin-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44f7e6f0-9e44-46ce-8ee8-833d56465f5d Mon, 25 Mar 2024 13:45:00 -0400 Unraveling epigenetic contributions to autoimmune skin diseases
新化合物有望成为更有效的血吸虫病治疗方法一种新开发的化合物在动物研究中显示出有望作为人类血吸虫病更有效的治疗方法，血吸虫病是一种由寄生虫引起的热带疾病，尚未得到充分研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/New-compound-shows-promise-as-a-more- effective-treatment-for-schistosomiasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/New-compound-shows-promise-as-a-more- effective-treatment-for-schistosomiasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77d77024-2e9a-451b-87cf-35bc6a25fcf8 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 13:31:11 -0400 New compound shows promise as a more effective treatment for schistosomiasis
长期不活动对胆固醇酯的影响因年龄而异一项检查胆固醇酯的新研究表明，长时间不活动可能会对不同年龄的人产生不同的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Prolonged-inactivity-affects-cholesteryl-esters- Differently-depending-on-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Prolonged-inactivity-affects-cholesteryl-esters- Differently-depending-on-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ede2fb01-941f-43da-9365-73a0a6ea57ee Mon, 25 Mar 2024 13:28:05 -0400 Prolonged inactivity affects cholesteryl esters differently depending on age
研究调查了美国成年人饮食炎症指数与中风风险之间的关系最近的一项研究表明，饮食干预有可能通过减少全身炎症来将中风发病率降低一半。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Study-investigates-the-relationship- Between-dietary-炎症-index-and-中风-risk-in-US-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Study-investigates-the-relationship- Between-dietary-炎症-index-and-中风-risk-in-US-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a18eef1a-ef7c-4245-a764-168836b6798a Mon, 25 Mar 2024 13:21:00 -0400 Study investigates the relationship between dietary inflammatory index and stroke risk in US adults
专家主张采用三管齐下的方法来识别失踪的结核病病例在迈向无结核病 (TB) 世界的征程中，关键的第一步始于识别受该疾病影响的个人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Experts-advocate- Three-pronged-approach-to-identifying-missing-tuberculosis-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Experts-advocate- Three-pronged-approach-to-identifying-missing-tuberculosis-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3825cb83-a419-4e4d-b97b-5ee71a113efd Mon, 25 Mar 2024 13:20:04 -0400 Experts advocate three-pronged approach to identifying missing tuberculosis cases
研究表明，吸烟史有限的电子烟使用者与吸烟者表现出相似的 DNA 改变一项研究评估了吸烟和电子烟的使用对与致癌相关的 DNA 甲基化变化的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Study-reveals-e-香烟-users-with-limited-smoking-history-show-similar-DNA-alterations-as-smokers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Study-reveals-e-香烟-users-with-limited-smoking-history-show-similar-DNA-alterations-as-smokers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10d01739-7100-4eb0-b6d1-0df4e486aca8 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 12:48:00 -0400 Study reveals e-cigarette users with limited smoking history show similar DNA alterations as smokers
研究增加了 2 型糖尿病和阿尔茨海默病之间联系的新证据在小鼠身上进行的新研究提供了在分子水平上可能导致糖尿病患者患上阿尔茨海默病的原因的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Study-adds-new-evidence-on-the-link- Between-Type-2-diabetes-and-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/Study-adds-new-evidence-on-the-link- Between-Type-2-diabetes-and-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ecdf8b40-7337-4aa5-b1f5-2304d3995d35 Mon, 25 Mar 2024 07:44:25 -0400 Study adds new evidence on the link between Type 2 diabetes and Alzheimer's disease
从非洲鲶鱼皮肤粘膜中提取的新化合物具有强大的抗菌特性科学家报告说，他们从养殖的非洲鲶鱼的皮肤中提取了一种具有强大抗菌特性的化合物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/New-compound-extracted-from-African-catfish-skin-mucas-exhibits-powerful-antibacterial-properties.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240325/New-compound-extracted-from-African-catfish-skin-mucas-exhibits-powerful-antibacterial-properties.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c6ded1d-2bd0-494a-8dd5-ae087b6640bd Mon, 25 Mar 2024 07:36:18 -0400 New compound extracted from African catfish skin mucas exhibits powerful antibacterial properties
